description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. It is the year 198X.  Big hair is hot, and the war with the Soviets is colder than a refreshing glass of New Coke.  RAD RAYGUN must travel the world fighting communist robots, and save the 1980's by shooting his way through 5 decade spanning levels.  Ultra sharp 144p resolution graphics and 4 unique shades of monochrome off-green bring Rad Raygun to life, as only 80's mobile technology can.

RAD RAYGUN must travel the world fighting communist robots, and save the 1980's by shooting his way through 5 decade spanning levels.  Ultra sharp 144p resolution graphics and 4 unique shades of monochrome off-green bring Rad Raygun to life, as only 80's mobile technology can.
